column5: Online booking! Private Pool Oasis! Beautiful home for 1 to 4 couples with 3 KING-SIZE beds and 1 Queen luxury Broyhill sofa bed in 4 separate bedrooms for privacy and spaces for singles too. Two full bathrooms & half bath. Private resort like backyard paradise with large pool, hot tub, fire pit, grills, and deep-seating luxury patio furniture. Wood-burning fireplace inside and luxury furnishings, towels and bed linens! Additional sleeping space for the kids or singles. Fully Equipped Kitchen.
column8: Luxury 4 Couples+ Dallas Area Resort-like Pool Spa
